get.description:
Aggregate by exact question_text. Output rows sorted by total_count desc:
[{ question_text, total_count, companies: [{ company, count }] }]

schema.title: Response Get Questions Frequencies Api V2 Analytics Questions Frequencies Get
Response Get Top Questions Api V2 Analytics Top Questions Get

get.description:
Return per-company list of questions with counts:
[{ company, total_questions, items: [{ question_text, count }] }]

schema.title: Response Get Companies Questions Api V2 Analytics Companies Questions Get

get.description:
Compute absolute and normalized score for each exact question_text.
Normalized score is sum over companies of (count(question, company) / total_questions_in_company).

schema.title: Response Get Top Questions Extended Api V2 Analytics Top Questions Extended Get

get.description: Top topics by absolute count and normalized score (sum over companies of count/company_total).

schema.title: Response Get Topics Top Api V2 Analytics Topics Top Get

get.description: Compute per-company diversity of topics using entropy and distinct topic count.

schema.title: Response Get Company Diversity Api V2 Analytics Company Diversity Get

get.description: Find companies most similar by topic distribution (cosine similarity on company x topic counts).
